Key Points: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. 2. Press your feet into the ground and lift your hips towards the ceiling. 3. Clasp your hands under your back and hold the pose.
Benefits: 1. Strengthens the back and legs. 2. Opens the chest and shoulders. 3. Stimulates the thyroid gland.
Instructions: 1. Keep your knees aligned with your hips. 2. Hold for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
